title: 1-Node Ability System
description: Quickly and easily implement modular gameplay abilities with a single node.
longDescription:
IMPORTANT: If you run into any issues or need help please reach out to me first or use the questions tab. The reviews section is not for troubleshooting. Products are tested by Epic Games and myself to be fully functional before publishing.


With the 1-Node Ability System you can quickly implement multiple types of abilities with a single blueprint node, all built to be scalable to fit any project quickly with minimal effort required.


The abilities available in this blueprint component include:

  1. Size alteration powers such as grow or shrink the player character and respective attributes such as speed and interpolation of size alterations.
  2. Dashing with multiple different types and a modular setup for simple project customizability.
  3. Flight abilities which can reproduce popular game mechanics such as a jetpack ability, all from a single node.
  4. SuperSpeed abilities which can be called at any time and have a variety of options such as simple setup for particle trails, custom sound effects, and more.
  5. Teleportation abilities with modular options all from a single node.
  6. A superjump or any type of launching of the character in the air and/or in a forward direction. this ability has a large range of use cases with a very modular approach for project customizability.
  7. A projectile ability for a very wide range of uses ranging from magic abilities to standard gun projectile systems, all using a single node that can scale with a very modular approach for project customizability.


TECHNICAL INFORMATIONÂ *

REQUIRED

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1deXtDPNzrae5zThyqIm3jNh7tcBr6TDFz_6hPYuSJXY/edit?usp=sharing

Need something custom? Check out our studio services: https://www.komodobitgames.com/services


Note: The assets used in this asset pack are designed only to be used for a technical demo of the ability system and are not recommended for full commercial projects.

Disclaimer: Environments from the screenshots are not provided as part of this project, they are made for screenshot purposes.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Size alteration abilities with multiple types.
  • Dashing abilities with multiple types.
  • Flight abilities.
  • SuperSpeed abilities.
  • Teleportation abilities
  • SuperJump or launching ability of multiple types.
  • Projectile ability that can be used for a wide range of projectile use cases.
  • Each ability uses a single blueprint node(Some may require a timeline node to make it feel smooth).
  • All of the abilities are done in a character component for minimal scope creep.
  • This component scales with most projects even with already existing systems and can be setup with minimal effort required.
  • Cooldown system for abilities.
  • Small in file size for minimal project size impact.
  • Can be modified using only blueprints if necessary.

Number of Blueprints: 3

Network Replicated: (No)

Supported Development Platforms: [Windows 32bit/64bit]

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (No)

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1deXtDPNzrae5zThyqIm3jNh7tcBr6TDFz_6hPYuSJXY/edit?usp=sharing

Video Tutorial: https://youtu.be/rx5pOvKhBJk
